name: Station 38
description:
Station 38 is a platformer where you guide a fragile space craft through dangerous levels. Complete all 38 levels to answer the mysterious S.O.S. message.

Station 38 was created by Pat Kemp, with music by Lang Kirchheimer. Powered by Flixel.

Critical analysis essay by Richard Terrell (KirbyKid): https://jayisgames.com/review/station-38.php

On Kongregate: https://www.kongregate.com/games/knivel/station-38

On Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/528145
